Address.value: 1001 FANNIN STREET,SUITE 1500 SUITE 1500, HOUSTON, Texas, 77002, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Chord Energy Corporation is a company engaged in hydrocarbon exploration and hydraulic fracturing in the Williston Basin in North Dakota and Montana. It is organized in Delaware and headquartered in Houston, Texas, with an office in Williston, North Dakota. The company was formerly known as Oasis Petroleum.

value.name: Darrin J. Henke
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
